# Install the package

```{r install, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("hesselberthlab/scrunchy")
```

# Seurat object

```{r create_sce}
library(scrunchy)
library(Seurat)

sce <- barnyard_data()

sce
```

# Plots

```{r plots}
TSNEPlot(sce, do.label = TRUE, pt.size = 0.5)

FeaturePlot(
  sce,
  features.plot = c("Uracil_45", "riboG_44","ENSG00000076248", "ENSG00000172922"),
  cols.use = c("lightgrey", "blue")
)

```
